title: Level 7 Human Resource Management (120 Credits)
study_pace: Flexible, up to 5 years to complete
ofqual_link: Level 7 Diploma in Human Resource Management – 603/0722/5
description: This Level 7 Diploma in Human Resource Management is an MBA advanced entry course providing 120 credits out of 180 required for a full MBA. The course consists of 6 interactive modules and 6 written assignments, with 40 guided learning hours per module.

additional_learning.optional_materials: 30 to 50 hours of recommended exercises, readings, internet resources, and self-testing exercises
additional_learning.support: 24/7 support, tutoring, and various support mechanisms

requirements: Level 6 qualification or a first degree
Considerable managerial experience may be considered in the absence of formal qualifications

modules: Investigating a business issue from an HR perspective

mba_top_up.details: Eligible to apply for an MBA top-up course online or on campus at UK universities, consisting of a dissertation or dissertation plus one module.

title: Level 7 Strategic Management and Leadership
study_pace: Flexible, up to 5 years to complete
ofqual_link: Level 7 Diploma in Strategic Management and Leadership – 601/5335/0
description: The Level 7 Diploma in Strategic Management and Leadership is an MBA advanced entry course providing 120 credits out of 180 required for a full MBA. The course consists of 30 interactive modules and 8 written assignments, with 40 guided learning hours per module.

additional_learning.optional_materials: 30 to 50 hours of recommended exercises, readings, internet resources, and self-testing exercises
additional_learning.support: 24/7 support, tutoring, and various support mechanisms

modules: The external operating environment of business

mba_top_up.details: Eligible to apply for an MBA top-up course online or on campus at UK universities, consisting of a dissertation or dissertation plus one module.

title: Level 7 Strategic Sales Management
payment_plan: Spread the cost over 24 months interest-free
description: Sales managers are responsible for identifying potential customers, appealing to their interests, and closing sales. This course provides the skills to improve sales performance.
progression: Eligible to top up qualification to a bachelor's degree at a range of UK universities
modules: From sales to sales management and coaching

requirements: At least 3 years of sales experience

title: Level 7 Project Management
payment_plan: Spread the cost over 24 months interest-free
study_pace: Flexible, you have up to 5 years to complete this course
description: The Level 7 Diploma in Project Management is an MBA advanced entry course that provides learners with 120 credits out of the 180 credits required to complete an MBA. The course comprises 6 interactive modules and 6 written assignments, with approximately 40 guided learning hours per module.
progression: Eligible to apply for an MBA top-up course at a range of UK universities
modules: Planning, controlling and leading a project
Operations and information management for project managers
Operations and global supply chain management
Managing risk, uncertainty and complexity in projects

option_b.requirement: At least five years of managerial experience

title: Level 7 Psychology
description: Unlock the gateway to a thriving career in psychology with this Level 7 Diploma. Delve into the intricacies of cognitive functions, including perception, executive functions, language, and attention, discovering their pivotal role in the fascinating realm of psychology. Gain not only theoretical knowledge but also practical skills essential for a successful career in the field.
payment_plan: Spread the cost over 24 months interest-free
study_pace: Flexible, you have up to 5 years to complete this course
modules: Social and Cultural Psychology and Psychology of Human Development

requirements: Level 6 qualification or a first degree
At least 3 years of relevant experience
